name: simd_uchar2
desc: A vector of two 8-bit unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_make_uchar2(simd_uchar2) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector.

items.name: func simd_make_uchar2(simd_uchar3) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified three-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_uchar2(simd_uchar4) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified four-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_uchar2(simd_uchar8) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified eight-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_uchar2(simd_uchar16) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified sixteen-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_uchar2(simd_uchar32) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified thirty two-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_uchar2(simd_uchar64) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified sixty four-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_uchar2(UInt8) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_uchar2(UInt8, UInt8) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified scalar values.

items.name: func vector2(UInt8, UInt8) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified scalar values.

items.name: func simd_make_uchar2_undef(UInt8) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_uchar(simd_char2) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 8-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_clamp(simd_uchar2, simd_uchar2, simd_uchar2) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns each element in a vector clamped to a specified range.

items.name: func simd_equal(simd_uchar2, simd_uchar2) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a vector is exactly equal to the corresponding element in a second vector, and otherwise returns false.

items.name: func simd_reduce_min(simd_uchar2) -> UInt8
items.desc: Returns the miniumum value in a vector.

items.name: func simd_reduce_max(simd_uchar2) -> UInt8
items.desc: Returns the maximum value in a vector.

items.name: func simd_reduce_add(simd_uchar2) -> UInt8
items.desc: Returns the sum of all elements in a vector.

items.name: func simd_min(simd_uchar2, simd_uchar2) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns the minimum value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_max(simd_uchar2, simd_uchar2) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns the maximum value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_bitselect(simd_uchar2, simd_uchar2, simd_char2) -> simd_uchar2
items.desc: Returns a vector that contains elements from either the first or second parameter, based on the corresponding element in the third parameter.
